title: Toxic Chinese players
body: Why are most Chinese players like toxic to the maximum while being real bad at the same time?

replies.body: Riot should introduce a filter for chinese profanity。 There is quite a bit of that.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=N6gP6EhN,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-18T11:58:47.839+0000)
>
> Riot should introduce a filter for chinese profanity。 There is quite a bit of that.

"sb"(short for "idiot"), "nima" ("your mum"), "caonima" ("fk your mum", culturally it's used as common and thus interchangeable with "fking hell" or "fuck you" in English context), "trash", "you suck" etc are the ones I noticed from Chinese players who can't type much English.

And I don't think it's even bad, considering I've seen much worse from those that could type English, whatever their origin might be.
I'm talking about the ones that actually talk in chinese, most people don't understand it but more often then not they are spouting insults at you.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=N6gP6EhN,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-12-18T12:02:51.366+0000)
>
> I'm talking about the ones that actually talk in chinese, most people don't understand it but more often then not they are spouting insults at you.

While I have no issues with introducing profanity filter for different languages, because well, we have that for English why not have it for other languages if they could help it, but I have a couple issues with this post and how they're expressed.

Maybe my experience are out of date, as I have been inactive in this game for quite a long time, and since I've come back I haven't run into people who play the entire match chatting in Chinese. But back when I still actively played, the ones I saw typing entirely in Chinese is either mostly talking about the game and the teammates' performances like any other player would, or that when they have premades they just ramble about whatever trivial things they've encountered irl and having a laugh at each other. I mean, they are all in the end of the day, just players like everybody else, some are cool people while others wouldn't be so much, a language difference is not going to change the fundamentals much if at all. 

If they do type insults that are legitimately just vile and bad, and that if you do understand the severity as well as the meaning of the said insult, feel free to report. But making the generalisation that they "more often then not they are spouting insults at you" is un-cool, even as a generalisation.

They do, as you said they talk about your gameplay, and the chinese judge that very hard and usually negative about your gameplay. Talking stats wise this is every 7 in 10 chinese players who talk negative about anothers play and can be very toxic in general when they die to the enemy while typing it. There is also a lot of FML kill me(not directed at another but still contains profanity which can be judged), fuck your mother, kill yourself, I'm going to kill you, uninstall and dc then smash your computer because you're bad, and general things like dickhead and %%%%. But yes most people don't understand chinese so they can get away with it, but every now and then someone does understand it, be their origin english or otherwise and it can be quite offensive.

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=N6gP6EhN,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-19T01:49:39.408+0000)

Talking stats wise this is every 7 in 10 chinese players who talk negative about anothers play and can be very toxic in general when they die to the enemy while typing it. There is also a lot of FML kill me(not directed at another but still contains profanity which can be judged), fuck your mother, kill yourself, I'm going to kill you, uninstall and dc then smash your computer because you're bad, and general things like dickhead and %%%%. But yes most people don't understand chinese so they can get away with it, but every now and then someone does understand it, be their origin english or otherwise and it can be quite offensive.

You do realise that's basically LoL's entire playerbase in a nutshell right, why do you have to label them specifically onto the Chinese players and paint it like it's only them who do any of these or that they're just more likely to do it than others (also I'm not sure why in your opinion, "fuck me" is actually a bad thing like an insult, because I don't think it is)?

Again, foreign profanity filter is okay, there is nothing wrong with that. But your intent for requesting that seems to be a bit screwed. You're requesting for an in-game feature not to provide or improve general service and/or experience, but to forward an assumption or otherwise an agenda on your part, that's not how things are done here.
I'm not saying it's only chinese people who do it, what I'm saying is people can get away with insults, even death threats scott free by using another language because the game doesn't pick up on it

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=N6gP6EhN,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-19T05:50:35.264+0000)
>
> I'm not saying it's only chinese people who do it, what I'm saying is people can get away with insults, even death threats scott free by using another language because the game doesn't pick up on it

In that respect, as I've said, I agree that having a foreign profanity filter is okay, and that severe abuses should be reported. 

But do note, we don't have filters for more elaborate kinds of insults such as death threats for English as well, since they come in various forms and sizes making it not possible to do without being too restrictive. However blocking out the usual and common profanity is easy to do and should be done anyway.

I haven't seen any chinese profanity myself, even tho I am also asian which I've not thrown any insults whatsoever, unless it was constructive criticism. 

If anyone is reading this then I would recommend to just pretend you cannot understand like anyone would do and just play.

LOL you have to post 2 threads in a row for this shit?

Why aren't you complaining about toxic players on forum 24/7 then? Because toxic players regardless of their origin, are already so prevalent in this game it's already a meme at this point.

But only having issues when they're Chinese is clearly cool right?

Please.
